mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM rocky_account a INNER JOIN rocky_member m on a.USER_ID = m.id WHERE a.total!=a.use_money+a.no_use_money+a.collection+a.FIRST_BORROW_USE_MONEY+a.e_use_money+a.e_freeze_money+a.e_collection
and m.USERNAME = #{accountValidateCnd.username}

SELECT count(1) FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t INNER JOIN rocky_member m on t.USER_ID = m.id WHERE t.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT!=t.ACCOUNT+t.INTEREST AND t.status IN (0,1,2)
and m.USERNAME = #{accountValidateCnd.username}

SELECT count(1) FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c INNER JOIN rocky_member m on c.USER_ID = m.id WHERE c.ADVANCE_YESACCOUNT < c.CAPITAL
and m.USERNAME = #{accountValidateCnd.username}

SELECT count(1) FROM rocky_account a,( SELECT al.* FROM rocky_accountlog al,( SELECT MAX(l.id) AS id FROM rocky_accountlog l GROUP BY l.user_id ) temp WHERE al.id=temp.id ) t, rocky_member m WHERE a.user_id=t.user_id and a.USER_ID = m.id AND ( a.total!=t.total OR a.use_money!=t.use_money OR a.no_use_money!=t.no_use_money OR a.collection!=t.collection OR a.FIRST_BORROW_USE_MONEY!=t.FIRST_BORROW_USE_MONEY OR a.DRAW_MONEY!=t.DRAW_MONEY OR a.NO_DRAW_MONEY!=t.NO_DRAW_MONEY )
and m.USERNAME = #{accountValidateCnd.username}

SELECT t.BORROW_ID as borrowId,b.NAME,t.sumRepaymentAccount,c.sumRepayAccount,t.sumRepaymentAccount-c.sumRepayAccount AS diff FROM ( SELECT t.BORROW_ID,SUM(REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT) AS sumRepaymentAccount FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t WHERE t.status IN(1,2) GROUP BY t.BORROW_ID ) t ,( SELECT c.BORROW_ID,SUM(REPAY_ACCOUNT) AS sumRepayAccount FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.status IN(0,1,2,3) GROUP BY c.BORROW_ID ) c,rocky_borrow b WHERE t.BORROW_ID = c.BORROW_ID AND b.id = t.BORROW_ID AND t.sumRepaymentAccount!=c.sumRepayAccount
and b.NAME like "%" #{accountValidateCnd.bname} "%"
order by t.BORROW_ID

SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT t.BORROW_ID,SUM(REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT) AS sumRepaymentAccount FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t WHERE t.status IN(1,2) GROUP BY t.BORROW_ID ) t ,( SELECT c.BORROW_ID,SUM(REPAY_ACCOUNT) AS sumRepayAccount FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.status IN(0,1,2,3) GROUP BY c.BORROW_ID ) c,rocky_borrow b WHERE t.BORROW_ID = c.BORROW_ID AND b.id = t.BORROW_ID AND t.sumRepaymentAccount!=c.sumRepayAccount
and b.NAME like "%" #{accountValidateCnd.bname} "%"

select t3.* from ( SELECT b.id,b.NAME,b.status,b.style,b.TIME_LIMIT as timeLimit,b.is_custody as isCustody, FROM_UNIXTIME(b.success_time) AS successTime, b.ACCOUNT,c.sumCapital AS collectionCapital,r.sumCapital AS repaymentCapital,t.sumCapital+IFNULL(t2.sumCapital,0) AS tenderCapital FROM rocky_borrow b left join ( SELECT c.BORROW_ID,SUM(CAPITAL) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.status IN(0,1,2,3) GROUP BY c.BORROW_ID )c on b.id=c.BORROW_ID left join ( SELECT r.BORROW_ID,SUM(r.CAPITAL) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE r.STATUS IN (0,1) GROUP BY r.BORROW_ID ) r on b.id=r.BORROW_ID left join ( SELECT t.BORROW_ID,SUM(ACCOUNT) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t WHERE t.STATUS IN (0,1,2) GROUP BY t.BORROW_ID ) t on b.id=t.BORROW_ID left join ( SELECT t2.BORROW_ID,SUM(REPAYMENT_YESACCOUNT-REPAYMENT_YESINTEREST) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t2 WHERE t2.STATUS =-2 GROUP BY t2.BORROW_ID )t2 on b.id=t2.BORROW_ID WHERE 1=1 AND b.STATUS IN (4)
and b.NAME like "%" #{accountValidateCnd.bname} "%"
and (b.is_custody=0 or b.is_custody is null)
and b.is_custody=1
) t3 where 1=1 AND ( t3.ACCOUNT!=t3.collectionCapital OR t3.ACCOUNT!=t3.repaymentCapital OR t3.ACCOUNT!=t3.tenderCapital ) order by t3.ACCOUNT desc

select count(1) from ( SELECT b.id,b.NAME,b.status,b.style,b.TIME_LIMIT as timeLimit,b.is_custody as isCustody, FROM_UNIXTIME(b.success_time) AS successTime, b.ACCOUNT,c.sumCapital AS collectionCapital,r.sumCapital AS repaymentCapital,t.sumCapital+IFNULL(t2.sumCapital,0) AS tenderCapital FROM rocky_borrow b left join ( SELECT c.BORROW_ID,SUM(CAPITAL) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.status IN(0,1,2,3) GROUP BY c.BORROW_ID )c on b.id=c.BORROW_ID left join ( SELECT r.BORROW_ID,SUM(r.CAPITAL) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r WHERE r.STATUS IN (0,1) GROUP BY r.BORROW_ID ) r on b.id=r.BORROW_ID left join ( SELECT t.BORROW_ID,SUM(ACCOUNT) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t WHERE t.STATUS IN (0,1,2) GROUP BY t.BORROW_ID ) t on b.id=t.BORROW_ID left join ( SELECT t2.BORROW_ID,SUM(REPAYMENT_YESACCOUNT-REPAYMENT_YESINTEREST) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t2 WHERE t2.STATUS =-2 GROUP BY t2.BORROW_ID )t2 on b.id=t2.BORROW_ID WHERE 1=1 AND b.STATUS IN (4)
and b.NAME like "%" #{accountValidateCnd.bname} "%"
and (b.is_custody=0 or b.is_custody is null)
and b.is_custody=1
) t3 where 1=1 AND ( t3.ACCOUNT!=t3.collectionCapital OR t3.ACCOUNT!=t3.repaymentCapital OR t3.ACCOUNT!=t3.tenderCapital )

SELECT b.id,b.NAME,b.status,FROM_UNIXTIME(b.success_time) successTime,b.is_custody as isCustody,r.id rid,r.BORROW_ID rBorrowId,r.ORDER,r.CAPITAL,c.sumCapital FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r,rocky_borrow b,( SELECT c.borrow_id,c.order,SUM(CAPITAL) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.status IN(0,1,2,3) GROUP BY c.borrow_id,c.order ) c WHERE r.BORROW_ID = c.BORROW_ID AND r.borrow_id = b.id AND b.status NOT IN(42,5) AND r.ORDER = c.ORDER AND r.CAPITAL!=c.sumCapital
and b.NAME like "%" #{accountValidateCnd.bname} "%"
and (b.is_custody=0 or b.is_custody is null)
and b.is_custody=1
order by r.CAPITAL desc

SELECT count(1) FROM rocky_b_repaymentrecord r,rocky_borrow b,( SELECT c.borrow_id,c.order,SUM(CAPITAL) AS sumCapital FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.status IN(0,1,2,3) GROUP BY c.borrow_id,c.order ) c WHERE r.BORROW_ID = c.BORROW_ID AND r.borrow_id = b.id AND b.status NOT IN(42,5) AND r.ORDER = c.ORDER AND r.CAPITAL!=c.sumCapital
and b.NAME like "%" #{accountValidateCnd.bname} "%"
and (b.is_custody=0 or b.is_custody is null)
and b.is_custody=1

SELECT b.STATUS as bStatus,b.NAME,b.is_custody as isCustody,FROM_UNIXTIME(t.addtime) as tAddtime,t.id,t.ACCOUNT,temp.sumCapital,t.interest,temp.sumInterest,t.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT repaymentAccount,temp.sumRepayAccount FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t,rocky_borrow b,( SELECT c.tender_id,SUM(CAPITAL) AS sumCapital,SUM(interest) AS sumInterest,SUM(REPAY_ACCOUNT) AS sumRepayAccount FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.status IN(0,1,2,3) GROUP BY c.tender_id ) temp WHERE t.id = temp.tender_id AND t.borrow_id = b.id #AND b.status NOT IN(42,5) AND (t.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT!=temp.sumRepayAccount OR t.ACCOUNT != temp.sumCapital OR t.INTEREST != temp.sumInterest)
and b.NAME like "%" #{accountValidateCnd.bname} "%"
and (b.is_custody=0 or b.is_custody is null)
and b.is_custody=1
order by t.ACCOUNT desc

SELECT count(1) FROM rocky_b_tenderrecord t,rocky_borrow b,( SELECT c.tender_id,SUM(CAPITAL) AS sumCapital,SUM(interest) AS sumInterest,SUM(REPAY_ACCOUNT) AS sumRepayAccount FROM rocky_b_collectionrecord c WHERE c.status IN(0,1,2,3) GROUP BY c.tender_id ) temp WHERE t.id = temp.tender_id AND t.borrow_id = b.id #AND b.status NOT IN(42,5) AND (t.REPAYMENT_ACCOUNT!=temp.sumRepayAccount OR t.ACCOUNT != temp.sumCapital OR t.INTEREST != temp.sumInterest)
and b.NAME like "%" #{accountValidateCnd.bname} "%"
and (b.is_custody=0 or b.is_custody is null)
and b.is_custody=1
